results.abstract: After months of tuning out American warnings that Vladimir Putin was preparing to invade Ukraine, Russians now realize that “this is not a game.”

multimedia.caption: The possibility of war is one of the greatest fears for Russians, who may have dismissed it as an outlandish concoction until recently.

results.title: For Many Russians, a Deep Unease Over Gathering Specter of War

results.abstract: Whether you call it a correction or a panic attack, a stock market that was already becoming shaky has been roiled by Russia’s hostilities toward Ukraine.

multimedia.caption: People watch the sunset near the port of Odessa in Ukraine, last week.

results.title: More Trouble for a Troubled Market
